publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3076 Christine Grahame: To Bling or Not to Bling—That the Parliament notes the warnings of the Electrical Safety Council regarding the use of Christmas lights over the festive period both inside and outside the home, in particular that some lighting is left on for extensive periods when the house is unattended and even overnight and, while appreciating that, in moderation, festive lighting cheers up Scottish winter days and nights, welcomes the council’s safety campaign for safe usage to ensure that the only thing that lights up is the glaur.

S3M-3076 To Bling or Not to Bling (lodged on 9 December 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Alex Neil*, Jackie Baillie*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3076 To Bling or Not to Bling (lodged on 9 December 2008) Christina McKelvie*

S3M-3076 Christine Grahame: To Bling or Not to Bling—That the Parliament notes the warnings of the Electrical Safety Council regarding the use of Christmas lights over the festive period both inside and outside the home, in particular that some lighting is left on for extensive periods when the house is unattended and even overnight and, while appreciating that, in moderation, festive lighting cheers up Scottish winter days and nights, welcomes the council’s safety campaign for safe usage to ensure that the only thing that lights up is the glaur. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Roseanna Cunningham, Rob Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Sandra White, Alex Neil, Jackie Baillie, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Bob Doris, Bill Kidd, Christina McKelvie, Aileen Campbell*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-3076 To Bling or Not to Bling (lodged on 9 December 2008) Angela Constance*
S3M-3076 To Bling or Not to Bling (lodged on 9 December 2008) Angela Constance*, Gil Paterson*
